Text.Value: Vagabonds and criminals frequent the Mermaid's exterior, dear readers.
It seems no commemorative events for Lord Gortash are planned at the Mermaid.
One would think, dear readers, that the death of Lord Gortash would inspire solemnity.

EditorData.NodeContext: composing a future newspaper article (almost like they're dictating) out lourd

Text.Value: Not content with broadsheet front pages, criminals stalk outside the Mermaid.
But there are better drinking spots to commemorate the late Lord Gortash.

EditorData.NodeContext: composing a future newspaper article (almost like they're dictating) out lourd

Text.Value: While I requested an interview, Captain Grisly certainly lives up to her name.
Look, what are heroic folks like you doing near a dump like the Mermaid?
This tavern is content to be a blight not only on the eyes, but also the soul.
I'm sorry to report, faithful readers, that the Mermaid's staff do not care...
While taverns like the Elfsong sit in safe streets - this is not true of the Mermaid.
...matched only in disappointment by its threadbare pint selection.

EditorData.NodeContext: composing a future newspaper article (almost like they're dictating) out lourd

Text.Value: The Mermaid, faithful readers, has the tackiest architecture...

EditorData.NodeContext: composing a future newspaper article (almost like they're dictating) out lourd

Text.Value: New, heroic clientele may be visiting the Blushing Mermaid, dear readers.
Readers sad at recent news may think the Mermaid a tempting sorrow-drowning spot.

EditorData.NodeContext: composing a future newspaper article (almost like they're dictating) out lourd

Text.Value: While I would love to report the Mermaid as nothing but an absolute hive...
In fact, 'hole' may the perfect word to describe the tavern...

EditorData.NodeContext: composing a future newspaper article (almost like they're dictating) out lourd

Text.Value: This is most untrue of the Blushing Mermaid. A raucous hive, as usual.

EditorData.NodeContext: composing a future newspaper article (almost like they're dictating) out lourd

Text.Value: Would anyone feel safe in a place like this? Not I, dear readers. Not I.
Tavern Review enthusiasts will note the absence of the landlord from this article.
...it appears local heroes frequent the tavern. Why? Only the gods can know.
Can hardly lambast the place if you're here. My readers will revolt.
The Blushing Mermaid. Not my preferred drinking hole, dear readers.

EditorData.NodeContext: composing a future newspaper article (almost like they're dictating) out lourd

Text.Value: Expect unceasing harassment by scum outside the Blushing Mermaid.

Synopsis:
Gazzet wanderer greeting AD.

The wanderer roams around Blushing Mermaid
